laws.full_text:
e new non-compete regulations at the state level.
Three States to Watch:
Illinois
Illinois is considering HB 5385, which would replace its 2022 non-compete law overhaul with a complete ban. Following California’s lead, this bill would void non-competes with all current employees and some former employees, regardless of where they were signed or maintained. Once again echoing California, the bill introduces  mplete ban.
